Objectives

  • Extending from the base theme

Steps

  1. Open the todoos app in your browser

    Notice the classic theme. http://localhost/advancedtheming/todoos

  2. Generate a theme and give it the name _CustomTheme

    (TIP see lab 2.)

  3. Build the theme

    (TIP see lab 2.)

  4. Extend from the base theme

    Open packages/CustomTheme/package.json and change the extend to ext-theme-base.

  5. Open with your editor the sencha config file /todoos/.sencha/app/sencha.cfg

  6. Switch the app.theme to the out of the new CustomTheme

  7. Open packages/CustomTheme/sass/etc/all.scss
